name: Ozone and Nitrogen Dioxide Concentrations
content:
Description: Ozone and Nitrogen Dioxide Concentrations in Major US Cities Oct 2004-Sept 2021

Source: [Adapted Lesson](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1RE7pVVlfBGYVBu0w83NOGjDGHVOK_FEYw6iltHrPEBc/edit?usp=sharing) via [My NASA Data](https://mynasadata.larc.nasa.gov/)

[Educator-Facing Datasheet](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1RE7pVVlfBGYVBu0w83NOGjDGHVOK_FEYw6iltHrPEBc/edit?usp=sharing)

Columns:

* CITY (string): Name of the city where the measurements were taken
* STATE (string): Name of the state where the measurements were taken
* DATETIME (string): Date in Month-Year format when the measurements were taken
* TIME (numerical): Numerical marking of measurements from 12692-18871
* LONGITUDE (numerical): Longitude for measurements
* LATITUDE (string): Latitude for measurements
* TROPOSPHERIC_NITROGEN_DIOXIDE_ (numerical): Monthly Tropospheric NO2 Column Density (10^15 molecules per square centimeter)
* TOTAL OZONE (numerical): Monthly Total Column Ozone (parts per billion by volume (ppbv))
